sentences.en: A bright fire was burning in the hearth.
A fire crackled on the hearth.
A log fire crackled in the hearth.
sentences.cn: 炉中的木柴烧得噼啪作响。

sentences.en: A log fire roared in the open hearth.
sentences.cn: 柴火在敞开着的壁炉里熊熊燃烧。

sentences.en: He dumped the logs on the big stone hearth.
sentences.cn: 他将一根根短棍木柴扔进巨大的石壁炉里。

sentences.en: He sat on a tapestry cushion next to the hearth.
sentences.cn: 他坐在壁炉边上的一块绣花软垫上。

sentences.en: He stammered, and turning his back on her walked toward the hearth.
sentences.cn: 他口齿不清地说, 然后背向她朝壁炉走去.

sentences.en: He stoked up the fire in the hearth.
sentences.cn: 他给壁炉里的火添了点柴。

sentences.en: I longed to be at my own hearth once again.
sentences.cn: 我渴望再回到自己家里.

sentences.en: I've laid the fire in the hearth, all you have to do is to put a match to it.
sentences.cn: 我已在火炉里放好木柴,作好了生火准备, 你只要把它点燃就行了.

sentences.en: It was winter and there was a huge fire roaring in the hearth.
sentences.cn: 时值冬天，壁炉里炉火熊熊。

sentences.en: Kneeling in front of the open hearth, old Maria was fanning the smoldering fire.
sentences.cn: 老玛丽亚跪在壁炉前的空地上，扇着闷燃的炉火。

sentences.en: She came and sat in a chair before the hearth.
sentences.cn: 她走过来,在炉子前面的椅子上坐下.

sentences.en: The embers still glowed in the hearth.
sentences.cn: 余烬仍在炉膛里发出暗淡的光。

sentences.en: There was a heap of old feathery wood - ashes on the hearth.
sentences.cn: 壁炉上有—堆轻轻的陈年的柴灰.

trans.tran_cn: 灶台，炉边，（高炉的）炉膛，炉缸，〈比喻〉家庭，壁炉地面
trans.tran_en: the area of floor around a fireplace in a house
